name: @mirus-private/tiptap-editor
description: custom setup for the tiptap editor
author: alec@mirusresearch.com

scripts.build: npm run build:unpkg & npm run build:es & npm run build:umd
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format umd --file dist/tiptop-editor.umd.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format es --file dist/tiptop-editor.esm.js
scripts.build:unpkg: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format iife --file dist/tiptop-editor.min.js
